plot: A mysterious bad girl checks herself into rehab to find someone to cook crystal meth for her. She recruits a young college-aged man for her get-rick-quick drug score scheme and breaks him out with the help of her abusive cop boyfriend. But that young man finds himself in the midst of a love triangle full of betrayal and danger, and things go from bad to worse. And they then do it all over again the next day.

f.role: Broken Bird: Implied with Skyler. The film provides hints of her being dragged into an abusive relationship with Russell at twelve years old. Russell's client Archer helped out in the process.

Femme Fatale: Skyler, obviously. She ends up killing pretty much everyone (though, per the curse, they all come back to life the next day), even using a grenade at one point. Nabiki, to a much lesser extent.
Lady in Red: Skyler. Her Establishing Character Moment has her wearing a silky red dress and matching heels, along with dark pantyhose and a leather jacket.

name: Blood Punch
